title: Client refuses to open (PC)
body:
I've been having this problem for a few weeks now. Each time it occurs, I have to reinstall the game to get it to open. Once it's open, I can leave it open indefinitely without issue. I can access everything, play games, no problems. As soon as I have to reboot my computer for any reason or close and reload the app, it refuses to open. I double-click, it pops up in the task manager, and then closes without doing anything.

After today's patch, reinstalling no longer works. I cannot access the game at all.

replies.body: So, I had a similar problem and this may or may not help, but what worked for me was to Disable/Enable my Gpus in the control panel. Since I have 2 Gpus, GTX and Intel, my client was opening on the "Wrong" Gpu (GTX instead of Intel) and my PC couldn't handle the client. As I said, my issue might have been a localised one, but if this speaks to you maybe you can give it a try.
Thanks for the suggestion. Unfortunately, I only have the one GPU.

Repair tool does nothing?

Have you disabled fast startup and hibernate? They break a lot of software, and this sounds suspicious..
I had hibernate disabled. I just now disabled fast startup, but no luck. Repair tool does nothing. Thanks for your suggestions though.
I've been having the same issue for the past few weeks on mac as well. Today it just stopped working completely. I hope the fix it soon
